author: cms-AlCaDB
body:
This PR introduces a simple analyzer in order to dump BeamSpot parameters for lumi-section directly from DB, enabling the possibility to cross-check re-reco LS-based BeamSpot conditions with respect to prompt production without accessing transient ASCII files. 
The newly added package is meant to host, in future, part of the content actually hosted by `RecoVertex/BeamSpotProducer` which is more related to conditions monitoring than to reconstruction.
attn: @franzoni @sarafiorendi @rmanzoni
title: Add tool for dumping LS-based beamspot from DB
